name: Floral Sidewinder
title: Collei: Floral Sidewinder
desc: Never underestimate Collei, and never underestimate her cat.
inPlayDescription: After your Collei, who has this card equipped, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">uses Floral Brush, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro-Related Reactions: Deal 1 <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro DMG. (Once per Round)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Collei to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Collei, equip this card.After Collei equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Floral Brush once.After your Collei, who has this card equipped, <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">uses Floral Brush, during this Round, when your characters' Skills trigger <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro-Related Reactions: Deal 1 <span style="color:#7EC236FF">Dendro DMG. (Once per Round)(You must have Collei in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
